SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Adriantown College?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Adriantown College is arc {Herman Research Center}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Jessicatown School?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Jessicatown School is arc {Herman Research Center}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Herman Research Center} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Jessicatown School} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Herman Research Center and Adriantown College is {78}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Jessicatown School and Herman Research Center in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Herman Research Center?
SC.A: The total flow output from Herman Research Center is {119}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 79? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {80} from {Adriantown College} to {Jessicatown School}, a flow of {82} from {Herman Research Center} to {Jessicatown School}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 51? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {37} from {Herman Research Center} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {21} from {Jessicatown School} to {Herman Research Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 51 and 71? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {65} from {Jessicatown School} to {Adriantown College}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Herman Research Center to Jessicatown School or from Herman Research Center to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Herman Research Center} to {Jessicatown School} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Herman Research Center to Adriantown College, from Jessicatown School to Adriantown College, or from Jessicatown School to Herman Research Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Jessicatown School} to {Adriantown College} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Adriantown College}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Adriantown College} and {Jessicatown School}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Herman Research Center, Arc Adriantown College, Arc Jessicatown School}.
